title: Mina's Daughter: The Harker Chronicles, Volume 2
description: Another installment in the Trestle Press Digital Short Story Cliffhanger In this second installment of the cliffhanger series “Mina's The Harker Chronicles”, Katie receives a note from a man claiming to be the grandson of Professor Abraham Van Helsing. She invites the handsome and mysterious Wolfgang Van Helsing to a supper party, only to find out that he was born and raised in New Orleans and has never met his famous vampire-slaying grandfather. Van Helsing admits that he has come to London to meet the daughters of John Harker, Arthur Godalming, and John Seward, and hints that there may be a horrible creature stalking Katie. When Dr. Seward arrives home early and interrupts the supper party, Van Helsing urgently requests to meet with the doctor regarding a particular family member who is currently residing in the insane asylum. STAY TUNED for the next installment launching November 15, 2011
author: S.L. Schmitz
